A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Do I really need to explain? They killed Luke's personality\, MaRey Sue\, \"We win by saving what we love\"\, the universe bends so that the main characters don't die\, Snoke\,. The movie is a complete mess. I didn't even know Luke died until about a week after I watched the movie because I got out of the cinema before the end because I couldn't handle it.
